medley.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a group of songs or tunes sung or played one after the other as a single piece of music
medley.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: He played a medley of Beatles songs.
medley.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a mixture of different types of the same thing which produces an interesting or unusual effect
medley.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a swimming race in which the competitors swim using four different strokes
